function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Participants with underlying health issues at risk for contracting COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of severe illness or complications","Mitigation":"Provide targeted support and protection for at-risk individuals","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring","People":"Participants with underlying health issues","Owner":"Healthcare providers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Low compliance with COVID-19 mitigation measures","Impact":"Higher transmission and spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Public education, enforcement of guidelines, incentivizing compliance","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, digital health passports","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, community leaders"},{"Description":"Perceived threat of Coronavirus","Impact":"Fear and anxiety leading to panic behavior","Mitigation":"Accurate and transparent information, mental health support services","Technologies":"Online information platforms, teletherapy services","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health authorities, mental health organizations"}]}
